meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>mother</kanji> of good <kanji>ferment</kanji>ation is <vocabulary>yeast</vocabulary>! If you want to bake a pie or bread you have to have the best. And if you don't have any, maybe your neighbor has some extra that you can borrow?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
